definition: abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
that level or higher/that amount or more/the above-mentioned/(used to indicate that one has completed one's remarks) That is all.
that level or lower/that amount or less/the following
to think (i.e. to take it to be true that ...) (Usually there is an implication that the notion is mistaken – except when expressing one's own current opinion.)

sentences.english: The city is noted for its handicrafts. Population, 745,000.
sentences.chinese: 這個城市以手工藝品著名。

sentences.english: Mengsk approached the smaller man and stood before him, an intimidating presence.
sentences.chinese: 蒙克斯以威迫的姿態靠近並站在這位小矮人前面。

sentences.english: Pray for the government to halt its campaign of targeting Christians .
sentences.chinese: 禱告政府會停止以基督徒爲箭靶的活動。

sentences.english: In most browsers to select one paragraph at a time, triple-click on it.
sentences.chinese: 在大多數瀏覽器中，三擊以選擇段落。

sentences.english: What is more, we have other two factories which are in Shanghai and Suzhou in China to supply the local market.
sentences.chinese: 另外，在上海和蘇州也有設廠，以供應當地市場爲主。

sentences.english: Replaceability is limited to changing the dependency to depend on something different.
sentences.chinese: 可替換性僅限於修改依賴關係以依賴不同的內容。

sentences.english: Or that double-digit interest rates dominated the 19th century?
sentences.chinese: 或者19世紀的利率以兩位數爲主？

sentences.english: Numbers other than integers can be represented in various bases.
sentences.chinese: 可以以的形式輸入任意底數的一個數字。

sentences.english: Yongbyon is approximately 60 miles [96 kilometers] north of the capital at Pyongyang.
sentences.chinese: 寧邊位於北韓首都平壤以北約96公里處。

sentences.english: No junketing activity would be conducted on official expenses without permission of the company.
sentences.chinese: 在未得到公司授權情況下，不得以公費進行宴請活動。

sentences.english: The accuracy and precision of measurements from electrical meter were analyzed by statistical technique.
sentences.chinese: 以統計方法分析所量得含水率數值之準確性與精密性。

sentences.english: I will praise God's name in song and glorify him with thanksgiving.
sentences.chinese: 我要以詩歌讚美神的名，以感謝稱他爲大。

sentences.english: I will praise God's name in song and glorify him with thanksgiving.
sentences.chinese: 我要以詩歌讚美神的名，以感謝稱他爲大。

sentences.english: These elements can be sorted, or processed in the order they appear.
sentences.chinese: 可以對這些元素排序，或以其出現的順序處理它們。

sentences.english: Emerging Asia has grown by an annual average of 8% over the past three years—as fast as before the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 過去三年來以年均8%的速度增長着，和危機前一樣。

sentences.english: Lafuma added a rubber toe strip to protect you from rocks and roots.
sentences.chinese: 拉弗馬增加了橡膠腳趾地帶，以保護您的岩石和根源。

definition: as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to rely mainly on/to attach most importance to
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
